Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel core i7 or ryzen
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX2080SUPER or AMD
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:

  • OS: windows 11 64bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
